text: is a Japanese city in Ehime on the island of Shikoku. ==History== Todo Takatora established a small domain at Uwa in 1595. The town developed around Uwajima Castle. Uwajima Castle at jcastle.info . Retrieved 2013-2-21. A cadet branch of the Date clan was established at Uwajima in 1614.Papinot, Edmund. (2003). Nobiliare du Japon -- Date, p. 5 [PDF 9 of 80;] Papinot, Jacques Edmond Joseph. (1906). Dictionnaire d’histoire et de géographie du Japon. (in French/German). ==References== ==Other websites== * Uwajima City website Category:Cities in Ehime Prefecture
title: Uwajima, Ehime
